name: sA Classroom
author: School Inc.
description: This parcel contains the lessons and assignments for section A.

artifacts.name: English: FQE
artifacts.fdesc: English First Quarter Exam is all about synonyms and antonyms. Exam starts at 8:00AM and ends at 9:00AM, December 2, 2024.

artifacts.name: Arts: FQFP
artifacts.fdesc: Arts First Quarter Final Preformance Task (PETA) is about masking and depth. Deadline is on December 1, 2024, 8:00AM.

artifacts.name: TLE: Pillow Making
artifacts.fdesc: For TLE, you have to create a pillow through sewing. Materials will be listed into the group chat soon.

artifacts.name: Arts: Glow in the dark stars
artifacts.fdesc: Create glow in the dark stars using glow in the dark paint provided by the school.
